summary: The Camden National Battlefield Park Study Act mandates the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a special resource study. This study will assess the suitability and feasibility of designating the Camden Battlefield area in South Carolina, encompassing the site of the Battle of Camden and Historic Camden, as a unit of the National Park System. The study will evaluate national significance, methods of protection and interpretation, the viability of a local partnership model, and associated costs. A report with findings and recommendations must be submitted to relevant congressional committees within three years.
